timeline_events.label: Arrived terminal
timeline_events.description: Container received at the marine terminal and awaiting intake processing.

timeline_events.label: Released from terminal
timeline_events.description: Terminal release issued; container is available for pickup.

timeline_events.label: Departed terminal
timeline_events.description: Container exited the terminal gate and is en route to the yard or destination.

timeline_events.label: Arrived yard
timeline_events.description: Container checked into the yard for staging, consolidation, or inspection.

timeline_events.label: Out for delivery
timeline_events.description: Driver has departed the yard for final delivery.

timeline_events.label: Arrived destination
timeline_events.description: Container arrived at the delivery destination or consignee facility.

timeline_events.label: Delivered
timeline_events.description: Delivery confirmed and proof of delivery captured.

eta_logic_states.label: ETA confirmed
eta_logic_states.definition: ETA derived from live telematics and confirmed driver availability.

eta_logic_states.label: ETA projected
eta_logic_states.definition: ETA calculated from historical transit time and current routing assumptions.

eta_logic_states.label: ETA at risk
eta_logic_states.definition: ETA exists but is likely to slip due to active delays or disruptions.

eta_logic_states.label: ETA unknown
eta_logic_states.definition: ETA cannot be computed due to missing telemetry, status, or route data.

delay_reasons.label: Gate congestion
delay_reasons.description: Terminal gate queues or access bottlenecks are slowing departures.

delay_reasons.label: Documentation hold
delay_reasons.description: Missing or invalid documents are preventing release or movement.

delay_reasons.label: Equipment shortage
delay_reasons.description: Chassis or yard equipment availability is limiting moves.

delay_reasons.label: Weather
delay_reasons.description: Severe weather conditions are limiting terminal or road operations.

delay_reasons.label: Driver late
delay_reasons.description: Driver checked in late or missed an appointment window.
